abstract: Google will unveil add-ons to Gmail that let people post and view messages about their day-to-day activities.
snippet: Google will unveil add-ons to Gmail that let people post and view messages about their day-to-day activities.
lead_paragraph: MOUNTAIN VIEW, Calif.  Google is trying once again to capture some of the momentum surrounding social networking companies like Facebook and Twitter by adding new features to Gmail, its popular e-mail service.

headline.main: Google to Add Social Features to Gmail
headline.print_headline: Google’s E-Mail to Offer Social Networking Features
